===========
gocept.cmmi
===========


zc.buildout recipe to build a software package from source by the usual
configure/make/make install procedure. Uses the gocept.download recipe to
download and extract the source archive.


.. attention::

    This recipe has been deprecated in favour of ``zc.recipe.cmmi``. Version
    1.3 of ``zc.recipe.cmmi`` has acquired the features that it used to lack
    in comparison with ``gocept.cmmi``.
